title.rendered: Compandent offers low-cost MELP or MELPe Data-Terminal Equipment (DTE) for interfacing vocoders with external Data Communication Equipment (DCE) such as modems

content.rendered:
Compandent offers low-cost MELP Data-Terminal Equipment (DTE) for interfacing vocoders with external Data Communication Equipment (DCE) such as modems or crypto devices, etc..

https://www.compandent.com/melpehw/

Compandent Low Cost MELP DTE (Data Terminal Equipent) FLEXI-232 is Available for Immediate Integration into Existing System and Testing

Compandent’s popular low-cost MELP Data-Terminal Equipment (DTE) for interfacing vocoders with external Data Communication Equipment (DCE) such as modems or crypto devices, etc. is available.

https://www.melp.org/melpehw/

excerpt.rendered: Compandent offers low-cost MELP Data-Terminal Equipment (DTE) for interfacing vocoders with external Data Communication Equipment (DCE) such as modems or…
